title: CanÂ´t receive MMS after upgrade to Android 10
content:
Hi,

I upgrade to Android 10 last week and since then I cannot send or receive MMS any longer. I need to reset and try to change the APN settings everytime, sometimes it works, sometimes not. 

The 4G connection seems to be lost as well, cause it states "LTE" instead - could this be related somehow? 

have anyone else faced the same issue? I have a Google Pixel 2 XL and Tele2 as carrier.
